yeahiamkhushboo: @redheadwayfarer you know when I got pregnant, I used to read your posts and make little notes about what I will teach my future daughter. I gave birth to a son. But then I realized, the things you write can be taught to boy as well, I feel it's more important for boys to know the things you write. So I promise you saloni! I am going to raise my son to be someone who doesn't discriminate, who will understand the concept of consent, who will treat all the genders equally, who won't feel ashamed to date a trans woman! This women's day I promise to raise a man who won't score his masculinity by shaming and dominating women rather he will count himself as a gentleman when he would be able to respect and value women, when he would be able to get over the shitty idea that women belong at home and men in the outer world, when he would be able to call himself as a feminist loudly and clearly to the whole damn society!
